loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy barbed wire and a water tank.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Jorge Adolfo

texts.es:
Jorge Adolfo tiene 52 años de edad es soltero, vive con su madre en la ciudad Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.
Jorge Adolfo se dedica al comercio en variedad de telas para la tapiceria.
Solicita el crédito para realizar compra de telas para la tapiceria que necesita.
Con la ayuda del crédito ahora podrá incrementar y fortalecer su negocio. 
Las compras y las ventas  de los productos lo realizan con frecuencia en la ciudad de Ambato y Quito cada 15 días.
El sueño de el es superarse de una mejor manera en el negocio desarrollarlo y que sea muy conocido en todos los lugares para así apoyar a su familia en lo necesario y darles mejor calidad de vida.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son a la competencia por lo cual tiene que superarla y esforzarse para estar al mismo nivel de las demás.
En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar actividades de albañilería como sillas, mesas, camas, cómodas, puertas, etc.
texts.en:
Jorge Adolfo is 52 years old, single, and lives with his mother in the city of Guaranda, in the Province of Bolívar. Jorge Adolfo works in fabric sales and upholstery. He is requesting this loan in order to purchase fabric for the upholstery work he needs to accomplish. With the support from the loan he will be able to grow and strengthen his business. He buys and sells his products every 15 days in the cities of Ambato and Quito.

His dream is to continue improving, developing and promoting his business so that it can become well known and provide him the means necessary to support his family and give them a better quality of life.  He faces challenges, among them competition in the market, which drives him to constantly perform at an equal or higher level than his competitors. In his free time, he enjoys mason work and building things, such as chairs, tables, beds, dressers, doors, etc.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for upholstery.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Elvira works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income selling spices in the market. Elvira is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

Elvira has sustained her business activities with the help of her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en:
Ma. Lourdes is 42 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Lourdes runs a retail shop in the Philippines and requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase stock for her shop. She has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items, like lotion, shampoo, powder, perfumes, and sandals. 

In the future, Ma. Lourdes would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her shop.

loans.name: Copaboka 2 Group

texts.fr:
Spéciose, membre du groupe COPABOKA 2 est mariée et a 50 ans. Elle a 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 26 ans le moins âgé a 15 ans. 3 de ses enfants  vont à l'école et elle n'a aucune autre personne en charge.
Son niveau d'éducation est 6 ans de l'école primaire.

Elle est devenu client d'ACB en 2012, et le cycle actuel est le 1èr. Le crédit qu'elle a demandé lui a aidé d'acheter les angrais chimiques et avec ce même crédit elle a payé la main d'oeuvre des gens qui ont cultivé son champs. Elle n'anticipe aucune difficulté de non remboursement de ce crédit.  Pour accroître son activité, elle prévoit de solliciter d'autres crédit pour devenir le premier dans son quartier qui fait l'agriculture du riz. Avec le profit, elle va développper le bien être de sa famille et payer le frais scolaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Spéciose is a member of the COPABOKA 2 group.  She is 50 years old, married, and has four children, ages 15 to 26.  Three of her children attend school, and Spéciose has no other dependent.  Her education level is 6 years of elementary school.

She became a client of ACB in 2012, and this is her first loan cycle.  The requested loan is helping her to buy chemical fertilizers and pay for the labor of the people who helped her cultivate her field.  She is expecting no difficulty in the repayment of this loan.  

In order to increase her activity, she is planning to request other loans which will enable her to become the first rice farmer in her neighborhood.  With the profits, she is planning to take care of her family's well-being and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Unión Progreso 2 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “UNIÓN Y PROGRESO II” iniciará su vigésimo segundo ciclo  en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Juan Pablo, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Ximena es la tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de carteras de cuero, venta de fruta seca, costura de ropa de bebe, producción de mantas, venta de bisutería, confección de chompas a mano.

La señora Ximena, indica que hace siete años que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su cuñada. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de confección de monederos de cuero que viene trabajando hace años, esta actividad la aprendió de su hermana.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital de trabajo (compra de cuero), misma que los adquirirá de las empresas distribuidoras y posterior a la elaboración lo comercializará en las ferias fronterizas. Este negocio le ayuda a apoyar a su familia pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.
  
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones y el trato del personal.

En la fotografía la señora Martha se encuentra al fondo con manta rosada y sombrero blanco
texts.en:
The Community Association, “Unión y Progreso II” will begin its twenty-second cycle with the Pro Mujer (Pro Woman) program, as a part of the Juan Pablo Center. This group is made up of eleven members and is managed by a board for which Ximena is treasurer. The association members work in various fields, including: leather purse sales, dried fruit sales, making and sewing baby clothing, blanket making, imitation jewelry sales, sweater knitting, etc.

Ximena joined the Pro Mujer association seven years ago when her sister-in-law invited her. Today, she makes a living making leather purses and wallets, a craft she learned from her sister.
 
Ximena plans to use this particular loan to purchase leather from distributors, which she will make into purses for sale in the fairs and markets near the border. Her business helps her to support her family, as she lives with her two children and her partner’s family. When asked what she enjoys most about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the meetings and the way they treat their personnel.

In the photo, Martha is the woman at the back with the pink shirt and white hat.

loans.use: to purchase leather.

loans.name: Rayda

texts.es:
Rayda nació en el distrito de Huayllabamba Provincia de Urubamba y vive en Urubamba que es la capital de la provincia. 

Rayda tiene 26 años edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, su actividad económica principal  es vender verduras en el mercado local de Urubamba, como por ejemplo, cebollas, tomates, legumbre, hortalizas, entre otros productos. Ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. 

En esta oportunidad Rayda requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como verduras, tomates  cebollas etc. para poder alcanzar Su sueño que es abrir una tienda de abarrotes en la ciudad donde nació.   
Rayda es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” del distrito de de Yucay de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Rayda was born in the Huayllabamba district of the Province of Urubamba. She presently lives in Urubamba, which is the capital of the province. Rayda is 26 years old, and is married with two children. She makes a living selling vegetables in the local market in Urubamba. Her products include: onions, tomatoes, legumes, and other items. She also works raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

Rayda is requesting this loan in order to purchase more merchandise for resale, such as vegetables, tomatoes, onions, etc. She hopes that this support will help her to realize her dream of opening a grocery store in the city where she was born. Rayda is a member of the community bank, “Virgen Natividad,” which is located in the Yucay district of the Province of Urubamba.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise.

loans.name: Progreso Y Desarrollo Group

texts.es: Personas empeñosas por salir adelante, de esta manera se denominan los integrantes del grupo “Progreso y Desarrollo" grupo conformado por 7 socios hace mas de 7 años, que entre el hogar y sus familias ven la forma de llevar ingresos económicos a sus hogares por medio de sus negocios. Tal así es, el caso de la señora Luz de 44 años de edad separada y con hijos todos ya mayores de edad y hace más de 6 años la señora Luz es empleada en una empresa textil de control de calidad. Gracias a este trabajo a podido darles educación a todos sus hijos y construir su casa esto lo hace con el mejor de los esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante cada día por el bien de ella y su familia. Con el reciente préstamo ella invertirá en la compra de ropa y poner el negocio de venta de ropa para damas y caballeros.
texts.en:
The group “Progreso y Desarrollo” (Progress and Development) is made up of seven members, all of whom are hardworking, entrepreneurial individuals. The group was established over seven years ago, and all of the members work very hard to bring resources home to their families and live economically. 

Luz is 44 years old, separated from her husband, and has grown children. She has been an employee of a textile quality control business for over six years. Thanks to this job, she has been able to educate her children, build her own house and work to get ahead and provide all she can for her family. With this most recent loan, Luz will invest in the purchase of clothing for sale in her men and women’s clothing business.

loans.use: to purchase textile products.

loans.name: Xiomara Yamil

texts.es: Xiomara es socia del Bancomunal Diamantes, tiene 19 años de edad, no tiene  hijos, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo, ella es  muy joven y nunca ahorraba pero ahora que ya aprendió se siente muy bien porque eso le ayuda a trazarse metas y cumplirlas, su negocio está creciendo y siente que está progresando como persona, esta muy feliz en FINCA Perú, porque aprende muchas cosas sobre todo con las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal, ahora  el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos para su negocio.
texts.en: Xiomara is a member of the Diamantes (Diamonds) Community Bank. She is 19 with no children and has a business selling cosmetics using catalogues. Xiomara is very young and never used to save money, but now that she has learned she is happy to save because it helps her set and reach her goals. Her business is growing and she feels like she is developing as a person. She is very happy with FINCA Perú because she learns many things during the trainings at her community bank. She will invest the loan money in cosmetics for her business.

loans.use: purchase inventory for cosmetics business

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
El señor Augusto, natural de la provincia de Urubamba ubicado en el Valle sagrado de los Incas, del Departamento del Cusco en Perú, pertenece al Banco comunal Virgen de Natividad, Tiene 36 años de edad y todos estos años fueron dedicados a la agricultura y ganadería, no tiene estudios académicos así que tampoco pudo terminar la escuela, tiene esposa y 2 hijos pequeños de 7 y 3 años. 

El Señor Augusto tiene una labor muy sacrificada por la naturaleza de su trabajo que le demanda muchas horas al día, todos los días de la semana él labora por largas jornadas para reunir un capital que le permitirá comprar nuevo ganado y posteriormente poder venderlo en la feria semanal de la comunidad conjuntamente con algunas verduras y hortalizas las cuales extrae de su parcela. Su trabajo es rutinario y fue siempre de esa manera, así que el requiere  de un nuevo préstamo para poder adquirir un nuevo ganado y posteriormente venderlo y así hacerse de mayor capital para prolongar y hacer crecer su actividad comercial.
texts.en:
Sr. Augusto is a native of Urubamba Province, which is located in the Sacred Valley of the Incas, Department of Cusco, Peru. He is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen de Natividad". Augusto is 36 years old and has spent his entire life devoted to agriculture and raising livestock. He does not have an academic education nor was he able to finish school. Augusto has a wife and two young children, ages 7 and 3.

He has a job that requires great sacrifice since he must work long hours each day. Throughout the week, he devotes a lot of time to gathering enough capital so that he can buy a new head of cattle that he can eventually sell at the weekly community fair. In addition, he grows a few vegetables and herbs on his land. His work follows a routine, and he has always operated in this manner.

Augusto needs a new loan so that he can acquire a head of cattle that he can sell later. This will give him more capital to prolong and grow his business.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle.

loans.name: Niño Compadrito Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NIÑO COMPADRITO”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La  socia es la Sra. Angélica; ella tiene 52 años de edad ,separada, y  tiene 02 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de habas y chuño, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual mediante este la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia a la vez se dedica a la crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas para luego venderlo a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería como habas para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la compra y venta de productos de primera necesidad, crianza de animales, compra y venta de maiz, maestro constructor.

La socia agradece  el préstamo  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The members pictured above belong to the community bank, “Niño Compadrito,” which is located in the Cusco district of the department and province of Cusco.

Angélica is a member of the group, and is 52 years old, separated from her husband, and has two children. She makes a living both buying and selling beans and potato starch, and she also dedicates a portion of her time to raising animals, such as chickens and guinea pigs. She sells her products to customers who demand them, and is a happy, responsible woman with a desire to get ahead.

Angélica is requesting this loan in order to purchase more merchandise for her business (such as lima beans). She is grateful for the support from the loan, and has promised to complete all payments on schedule. 

The other members make a living buying and selling other staple items, raising animals, buying and selling corn, and in construction.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise (beans) for a business.

loans.name: Sonia Viviana

texts.es: Sonia es socia del Bancomunal Diamantes, tiene 52 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y también es profesora, ella es socia de FINCA Perú hace 3 años, y en ese tiempo pudo hacer buenas amigas en su Bancomunal,  ella aprendió a ser mas responsable, puntual y a ahorrar, da gracias por todo el apoyo que recibió , ella manifiesta que FINCA Perú para ella es una institución totalmente diferente porque siente calor humano, y todas son tratadas como una familia,  las reglas para ella son lo mas importante y todo lo aprendió siendo socia de FINCA Perú. Ahora  el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos para su negocio.
texts.en: Sonia is a member of the Diamantes (Diamonds) Community Bank. She is 52 with two children. She sells cosmetics and is also a teacher. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for three years, and in this time she has made good friends at the community bank. She has learned how to save money and to be more responsible and punctual. She is grateful for all the support she has received. Sonia feels that FINCA Perú is a different kind of organization because you can feel the human connection and everyone is like one family. The rules she has learned as a member of FINCA Perú have been very important for her. She will use the loan money to purchase cosmetics for her business.

loans.use: purchase inventory for her cosmetics business

loans.name: Faimafili

texts.en:
Faimafili is 25 and married with three children. She owns and operates a business baking and selling a variety of baked goods in the local community. She has two years of experience in this business.    

Faimafili needs a loan of 1500 WST to purchase additional ingredients. She plans to use the profit from her sales (an estimated 350 WST per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Faimafili joined SPBD to gain access to financial services, and this is her second loan with the company. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make baked goods for sale.

loans.name: Maupulu

texts.en:
Maupulu is 41 years old and married with two children. She owns and operates a business planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has two years of experience in this business.    

Maupulu needs a loan of 1,500 WST to purchase general farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (an estimated 350 WST per week) to make improvements to her house.

In 2011, Maupulu joined SPBD to gain access to financial services, and this is her second loan with the company. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment for growing taro.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 25 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. For the past two years Mary Grace has had a shop where she sells gasoline by the liter.

Mary Grace has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. She has requested a loan of 14,000 PHP from HSPFI to buy more gasoline to sell. Her ambition is to improve her shop.

loans.use: to buy more gasoline to sell.

loans.name: Zandra

texts.es: Zandra es socia del Bancomunal Estrellita, tiene 34 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos,  se dedica a la venta de ropa y oro en la cuidad de Cuzco,  ella aprendió a ser puntual y  responsable, está sorprendida porque sus ahorros se han incrementado  sin  que se haya dado cuenta. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y oro para su negocio.
texts.en: Zandra is a member of Estrellita (Little Star) Community Bank. She is 34 years old and has four children. She works selling clothing and gold in the city of Cuzco. As a member of the community bank, she has learned to be more punctual and responsible. She was pleasantly surprised because her savings have grown without her noticing. Zandra will use the loan money to purchase clothing and gold for her business.

loans.use: purchase clothing and gold for her retail business

loans.name: Talaave

texts.en:
Talaave is 32 years old and married with three children. She owns and operates a small plantation planting and harvesting taro for sale, and she has two years of experience in this business.    

Talaave needs a loan of 1,500 WST to purchase general farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (an estimated 350 WST per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2011, Talaave joined SPBD to gain access to financial services, and this is her second loan with the company. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment for growing taro.

loans.name: Suchet

texts.en:
Suchet is 35 years old, married and has two children. For the past five years Suchet has had a sari-sari (general) store where she buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care and home use products and beverages.

Suchet has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP from HSPFI to buy more canned goods, snacks, soap, detergents, beverages, etc. to sell. Suchet hopes to improve her business so as to pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her shop.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 25 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. 

Tessie has a convenience store, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has been in this business for five years. 

Tessie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011, and she requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to buy stock. In the future, Tessie hopes to improve her business so she can pay for the education of her child.

loans.use: to buy stock for her general store.

loans.name: Lote

texts.en:
Lote is 35 years old and married with three children. She owns and operates a bakery in the local community. She has two years of experience in this business. Lote needs a loan of WST $1,000 to purchase baking equipment. She plans to use the profit from her sales (estimated to be 350 tala per week) to improve and expand her business.

Lote joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.  This is Lote's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase baking equipment for making baked goods to sell.

loans.name: Iokapeta

texts.en:
Iokapeta is 41 years old and married with three children. She owns and operates a bingo venture in her local community. She has two years of experience in this business. Iokapeta needs a loan of WST $1,000 to purchase game equipment. She plans to use the profit from the games (estimated to be 250 talas per week) to continue improving her business.

In 2012, Iokapeta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Iokapeta's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to pay for game equipment to run bingo games.

loans.name: Matauaina

texts.en:
Matauaina is 25 and married with one child. She plants and harvests bananas for sale. She has two years of experience in this business. Matauaina needs a loan of WST $1,000 to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas per week) to continue improving her plantation.

In 2010, Matauaina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Matauaina's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers to grow bananas.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: Rosalina lives in Campo 4, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 23 years old, and married with one child who is an infant. For eight years, she has made a living by growing rice and earns about 18,000 a month from her work. In 2009, Rosalina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her life and ability to engage in business. She  is applying for a new loan, for 50,000, to purchase young crops and to pay labor costs for plowing her land. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase young crops and to pay labor costs for plowing.

location.town: Campo 4, Ramon MAgsaysay Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Eladia

texts.en:
Eladia is 48 years old, married and has eight children. For the past five years she has operated a sari-sari (general) store where she buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care and home use products and beverages.

Eladia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. She has requested a 18,000 PHP loan to buy more stock to sell from her shop. Eladia hopes to improve her business so as to pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell from her shop.

loans.name: Silvestra

texts.en: Silvestra is a 59-year-old married woman with two children. Her husband is a farmer. Silvestra makes curtains that she sells to her community. She also provides general alterations and tailoring services. Silvestra earns about 4,000 PHP per month with her business. She requested a loan to buy more clothes, thread, needles, and other tailoring materials. Silvestra hopes to succeed in her business.

loans.use: to buy tailoring supplies.

loans.name: Elida Cristina

texts.es: Elida es socia del Bancomunal Flor de Coral, tiene 30 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo, es dueña de una bodega, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 3 años, ella aprendió a ahorrar, a ser más responsable, con las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal aprendió mucho sobre cómo hacer empresa y cómo tratar al cliente, aprendió también a valorarse más, agradece a FINCA Perú porque con las ganancias que obtuvo ella pudo equipar su casa. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite para su bodega.
texts.en: Elida is a member of the Flor de Coral Community Bank. She is 30 and has a son. She is the owner of a grocery store. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for three years. She has learned how to save money and be more responsible. With the trainings she has received at her community bank she learned a lot about how to run a business, how to treat customers, and improved her self-esteem. She is thankful for FINCA Perú because she has been able to furnish her house with the profits she earned. She will use the loan to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and oil for her grocery.

loans.use: purchase rice, sugar, milk, and oil for her grocery store

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
For over seven years in Maguikay, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur Agnes, a 39-year-old married mother of two children, has made a living through her furniture business. She earns 8,500 PHP a month.
In 2010, Agnes joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase tools and other equipment to expand the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase tools and other equipment to expand the business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is from San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 50 years old. Elizabeth is married and has one child. To make a living, Elizabeth plants and harvests rice for sale. Elizabeth been in her business for 22 years and earns 33,000 PHP a month. In 2008, Elizabeth joined GDMPC. Elizabeth is requesting a loan of 50,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

location.town: San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en: Saturnina is a married woman with two children. Saturnina is 43 years old and lives in Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte, Philippines. Saturnina owns and operates a nipa-making (weaving nipa palm to make roofing materials) business. She's been in this business for four years. Each month, she earns 3,500 PHP. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase more nipa palms for nipa-making. Saturnina has been a member of GDMPC for three years. In the future, Saturnina wants to build a house and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more nipa palm used in nipa-making.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en: Juana is 54 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and the mother of three dependents. Juana has a food business selling bananas to the local community. She has been engaged in this business for 12 years. Each month, she earns 15,000 PHP. She has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase more bananas to sell. Juana has been member of GDMPC for four years. In the future, she hopes to expand her fruit business.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Emerlita

texts.en:
Emerlita is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 
Emerlita has a pigpen where she sells mature pigs. Aside from that she also has a shop where she sells canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, bananas and beverages. She has had this business for 15 years. She has requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to buy pig feed, such as Pigrolac, Purina and Unifeeds.
Emerlita has been a member of HSPFI since 1996. In the future, Ermelita hopes to improve her business to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Ma. Jovelou

texts.en:
Ma. Jovelou is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines; she is married with one child. Ma. Jovelou has a computer shop that provides internet services and online computer games. She has been in this business for five years. 

Ma. Jovelou requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy tools, such as a screw driver, for uploading new games for kids. She will also use the loan to pay for the electricity needed to provide her services.

loans.use: to buy tools for the maintenance of her internet cafe.

loans.name: Senara

texts.en:
Senara is a 40-year-old woman living in the town of Patamea. She is married and has 5 adult children. To make a living, Senara owns and operates a taro and banana plantation. Senara has been engaged in this business for more than six years and earns approximately 700 WST a month from these activities.

In 2008, Senara joined SPBD to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities.  Senara has successfully repaid a previous loan of 2,000 WST from SPBD. This previous loan was used to purchase general farm supplies and equipment. Senara is now requesting a new loan of 2,000 WST which will be used to purchase harvesting equipment such as wheelbarrows, shovels, rakes, baskets, and knives. The loan will be Senara's fourth loan from SPBD. Senara plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business  to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase harvesting equipment such as wheelbarrows, shovels, rakes, baskets, and knives

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria tiene 67 años de edad, ella es viuda hace 10 años, y cuenta que ella tiene una pequeña despensa en su casa hace más de 15 años. Pudo emprender dicha actividad gracias a un ahorro con que contaba gracias a unos trabajos que ella hacía.
La Sra. Maria tiene como anhelo verles a sus nietos convertirse en grandes profesionales y que sean personas de bien para la sociedad y para consigos mismos. Ella se defina como una persona muy trabajadora y con ganas de salir adelante siempre.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, lácteos, panificados, fideos, arroz, etc.  ya que cuenta con muy buena demanda en la venta de sus productos.
texts.en:
Maria is 67, and has been a widow for 10 years.  She tells us that she has had a small grocery store in her home for more than 15 years. She was able to launch this business thanks to savings she had, because of some jobs she used to do.

Maria has a strong desire to see her grandchildren become successful professionals, and persons of worth to society and to themselves. She defines herself as a very hard-working person who is eager to always move forward in life.

She is applying for the loan to buy drinks, dairy products, baked goods, noodles, etc., as she has very good demand for these products.

loans.use: To buy drinks, dairy products, noodles, rice, etc.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys es socia del Bancomunal Diamantes, tiene 36 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 2 años, se dedica a la elaboración de papa seca,  ella aprendió en su Bancomunal muchas cosas como la solidaridad, y a ser más responsable, está muy feliz en FINCA Perú porque todo el apoyo que recibe ahí nunca lo recibió en ningún otro lado, y también lo que aprende le ayuda en la educación de sus hijos, ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de papa y el pago de los peones.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the Communal Bank "Diamantes" (Diamonds). She is 36 years old and the mother of two children. Gladys has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She prepares dried potatoes and learned many things from her Communal Bank, such as solidarity and responsibility.

Gladys is very pleased with FINCA Peru because of all the support she has received, which she was not able to obtain anywhere else. She also learned how to help her children with their education. The loan she is requesting now will be invested in the purchase of potatoes and the salary of her workers.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes and pay the salary of her workers.

loans.name: Restituto

texts.en: Restituto is 32 years old and married with three children aged one, three and four. He is a farmer working in San Miguel, Bohol. He has been growing and selling rice for six years. Restituto earns 4,000 PHP per month. He plans to use his loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds. Restituto hopes to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.en: Zacarias is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. He primarily grows rice crops to sell. Zacarias works hard to keep his farm productive as it is the source of his family's income. Zacarias requested a loan to purchase fertilizer and other farming needs. He hopes to achieve an abundant harvest. Zacarias also hopes to elevate his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm needs

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 43 years old and a married woman with seven children aged between four and 22 years. Her husband is a fisherman. Maria is also involved in the fishing business. She sells her husband's catch at their town market. She also sells bread and rice cakes to her neighbors. Maria works hard to support her family, especially her children's education.

Maria has requested a loan to purchase fishing nets and lead weights. She hopes for her family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and lead weights.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 
Wilma has a food store (sari-sari) where she buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 11 years. She has requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, biscuits, shampoo, soap and beverages.
Wilma has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Wilma hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, biscuits, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Jaime Eduardo

texts.es:
Jaime Eduardo tiene 44 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con su esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.
 
Solicita el crédito para pagar el estudio de los hijos de la proaria y para el consumo familiar.
Con la ayuda del crédito podre trabajar tranquilo sin muchas preocupaciones.
Las compras de los productos los realiza el la libreria San Pedro 
El sueño criar y cuidar a sus hijos de la manera más paciente y delicada, para verlos convertidos en unos excelentes profesionales.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es seguir una carrera profesional y con mucho empeño para seguir adelante.
En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte, mantener al barrio lindo y mantener amistades.
texts.en:
Jaime Eduardo is 44 years old, is married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the city of Guaranda in Bolívar province.  He is asking for a loan so that he can pay for his children’s studies and his family’s basic needs.  This loan will allow Jaime Eduardo to keep working without worrying too much.  He sells products to the San Pedro bookstore.

Jaime Eduardo’s dream is to take care of his children and raise them in a way that is both patient and gentle so that he can see them become successful professionals.  The main challenges he faces are maintaining a professional career and carrying on with great determination. 

In Jaime Eduardo’s free time he enjoys playing sports, keeping his neighborhood looking nice, and spending time with friends.

loans.use: to pay for his children’s studies.

loans.name: Sonia Victoria

texts.es: Sonia es socia del Bancomunal Estrellita, tiene 23 años de edad, no tiene hijos pero cría a su sobrino que esta a su cargo desde los 3 meses de edad, se dedica a la venta de jugos de frutas, ella está muy feliz en su Bancomunal donde es Presidenta de la Junta Directiva y ha aprendido mucho. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de frutas para su negocio.
texts.en: Sonia is a member of the communal bank “Estrellita,” or “Little Star.” She is 23 and does not have any children, but she has been in charge of raising her nephew since he was 3 months old. She sells fruit juices. She is very happy at the communal bank, where she is chair of the board of directors and has learned a great deal. Now, she is requesting a loan to purchase fruits for her business.

loans.use: buy fruits for her business

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es: Avelina es socia del Bancomunal Flor de Coral, tiene 30 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 3 años, es dueña de una chacra de cereales y los lleva a las ferias a venderlos, gracias a las ganancias que tiene pudo techar su casa y educar a sus hijos, las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal le ayudan también con la crianza de sus hijos. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de semillas e insecticidas para su chacra.
texts.en: Avelina is a member of the communal bank Flor de Coral.  She is 30 years old, is the mother of two children and has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years.  She owns a small farm to grow grain which she takes to markets to sell.  Thanks to her earnings she has been able to roof her house and educate her children.  The trainings that she receives in her communal bank also help her in raising her children.  She will invest the loan that she is requesting in the purchase of seeds and insecticides for her small farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds and insecticides for her small farm.

loans.name: Ranulfo

texts.en:
Ranulfo is a 45-year-old married man with two children. He owns and manages a sari-sari store in Trinidad, Bohol. Ranulfo sells items like canned goods, detergent, sugar, and soft drinks. Ranulfo earns 5,000 PHP per month. He also tills a small parcel of land on which he grows rice.

Ranulfo has requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as rice, soft drinks and sugar. He hopes to have a successful business. He also hopes for his family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as rice, soft drinks and sugar.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 
Rosalia has a pigpen where she sells mature pigs. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan for 13,000 PHP to buy pig feed, such as Purina, Pigrolac and Unifeeds.
Rosalia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Rosalia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy animal for pigs.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 

Nena has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to increase her stock of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages.

Nena became a member of HSPFI in 2012.  In the future, Nena hopes to improve her business so she can provide for the education of her children.

loans.use: to increase her stock of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a 22-year-old married woman with two children age one and three. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Emily owns and manages a sari-sari store in Trinidad, Bohol. She sells various items like eggs, sugar, vinegar and canned goods. Emily does her best to improve her business and take care of her children. She applied for a loan to buy more merchandise to sell such as soft drinks, canned goods and rice. Emily hopes for her business to grow. She also hopes for her family to have a healthy and progressive life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell such as soft drinks, canned goods and rice.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with three children. 
Reynaldo provides motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He has requested a loan for 14,000 to buy tools like a T-wrench, screw driver, and air compressor, as well as gasoline.
Reynaldo has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Reynaldo hopes to improve his services for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy tools to service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Foloi

texts.en:
Foloi is 50 years old and married with four children. She plants and harvests bananas for sale. She has two years of experience in this business. Foloi needs a loan of WST $1,500 to purchase weed killers such as Gramoxome. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $146 per week) to continue improving her plantation.

In 2011, Foloi joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Foloi's second loan from SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed killers for growing bananas.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es: Eugenia es socia del Bancomunal Flor de Coral, tiene 28 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 6 meses, es dueña de una combi y también vende quesos, ajo y ropa en las ferias, ella recuerda que vino sola a FINCA Perú, y la recibieron muy bien, ahora desea seguir ahorrando para progresar en su negocio, las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal le encantan porque le sirven para dirigir mejor sus metas. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para su negocio.
texts.en: Eugenia is a member of the Coral Flower Community Bank. She is 28 years old and has one son. She has been a member of Finca Perú for 6 months. She owns a van and also sells cheeses, garlic, and clothing at the markets. She recalls that she came alone to Finca Perú and they were very welcoming of her. Now she desires to keep saving to grow her business. She loves the training she gets from the community bank because they help her better achieve her goals. She will use the requested loan to invest in the purchase of clothing for her business.

loans.use: buy clothing to sell at her business

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel es socia del Bancomunal Flor de Coral, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 8 años, es dueña de una bodega y de una chacra donde siembre papa y trigo. Todos estos años ella aprendió mucho sobre cómo ser mejor madre y negociante, las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal le ayudan a tener los conocimientos necesarios para llevar bien su negocio, agradece la facilidad del préstamo y la confianza que depositan en ella. Ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de una camioneta que le servirá para traer los productos de la chacra a su negocio.
texts.en: Isabel is a member of the communal bank “Flor de Coral.” She is a mother of 2 children and has been a member of FINCA Peru for 8 years. She is the owner of a grocery store and a small farm, where she plants potatoes and wheat. Over the years she has learned a lot about how to be a good mother and a good businessperson. The training that she receives in the communal bank helps her have the knowledge she needs to run her business well. She is thankful for the ease of the loan and the confidence placed in her. Now she is requesting the loan to invest in a pickup truck that would allow her to bring the products from her farm to her business.

loans.use: purchase a pickup truck to bring products from her small farm to her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy products (groceries, noodles, milk)

loans.name: La Primavera Group

texts.es:
El comite la primavera se formo con 10  señoras que se encuentran muy entusiasmadas y desean hacer actividades para recaudar fondo para su ahorro y de esa forma poder ayudar a sus familias y seguir creciendo.
La señora Jovina es una de las miembros del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, como ser remeras, blusas, camisas, polleras, pantalones y demás. Ella se define como una persona con mucho potencial y ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que siempre se esfuerza al máximo para poder sobresalir.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas para el invierno, ya que se acerca el frío y quiere poder estar bien surtida para ello.
texts.en:
The committee “La Primavera” or “Spring,” is composed of 10 women who are very enthusiastic and aim to earn money to put in their savings, which would allow them to help their families and continue growing. 

Jovina is one of the members of the group. She sells all kinds of clothes, including t-shirts, blouses, shirts, skirts, pants, and more. She describes herself as a person with a lot of potential and drive to succeed, which is why she always makes every effort to excel. She is requesting the loan to purchase winter clothes, since it’s getting colder and she wants to be well stocked for the winter season.

loans.use: purchase winter clothes to sell

loans.name: Juntos Por El Progreso Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JUNTOS POR EL PROGRESO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marcelina ella es conviviente y tiene 49 años y tiene 7 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, polos, blusas y casacas, la socia vende en forma independiente, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, polos, casacas y chompas al por mayor.
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de plásticos, negocio de venta de cosméticos, negocio de servicio de llamadas, negocio de bar.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These entrepreneurs belong to the “JUNTOS POR EL PROGRESO” [“Together for progress”] Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

One of the group’s members is Marcelina.  She is 49 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has 7 children.  She makes a living selling clothing such as pants, polo shirts, blouses, and jackets.  She sells these items as an independent vendor.  Marcelina works from 9:00 AM until 6:00 PM, and through her business she is giving her children a good start in life.  Her dream is to have her own space for her clothing business.  

Marcelina is asking for a loan so she can purchase pants, polo shirts, jackets, and sweaters wholesale.  The other members of her group make a living from activities such as selling plastic, selling cosmetics, operating a telephone call center, and running a bar.  

Marcelina is grateful to everyone who is helping to make her dream possible and is committed to making all of her loan payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase pants, polo shirts, jackets, and sweaters wholesale.

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru: Икром 37-летний женатый мужчина, проживающий в городе Исфара.  У него четверо детей. Икром арендует участок, где предоставляет услугу. Он готовить шашлык. В этой области Икром 8 лет. Он берет кредит для покупки мяса, шпажек и шампур.
texts.en: Ikrom is a 37-year-old married man living in the city of Isfara. He has four children. Ikrom leases a retail location where he sells kebabs. He has been engaged in this activity for 8 years. He is taking this loan to purchase meat and skewers.

loans.use: to purchase meat and skewers

loans.name: Odina

texts.ru: Одина житель района Восеъ. Ему 55 лет. Он женат. У него 8 детей. Он занимается посевом овес и выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности Одина занимается три года. Он берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений и топлива.
texts.en: Odina lives in the Vose region. He is 55 years old, married, and has 8 children. Odina has been cultivating oats and vegetables for the past three years. He is taking this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Kuña Pukavy Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Kuña pukavy se conformó en el año 2010, con mucho esfuerzo ya  se encuentran en el 4° ciclo, trabajando en forma conjunta dentro del programa de mujeres emprendedoras. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y con ganas de ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Una de las miembros es la Sra. Dilma quien se dedica a la venta de sabanas y colchas, y nos comentan que mediante el  la ayuda de la fundación pudo mejorar bastante su actividad y su nivel de vida e ingreso económico. Ella nos comenta que mediante este negocio la economía de la familia mejoró bastante.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas, con lo cual podrá estar abastecida para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Ellas están agradecidas con la fundación por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Women's Committee named Kuña Pukavy was established in the year 2010, and with hard work they now are in their 4th loan cycle, working together within a program for self-employed women.  These are very hardworking women and want to help each other.  

One of the members is Mrs. Dilma, who engages in the sales of sheets and blanket sets, and she tells us that the help of the foundation was able to really improve her business and her lifestyle and income level.  She says that because of this business, the family's economic state was greatly improved.

She is asking for this loan to buy linens, which will keep her business well-supplied to meet the demands of her customers.  The women feel grateful to the foundation for the opportunity they are being given.

loans.use: to buy linens for sale.

loans.name: Ramon Nonato

texts.es: Ramón Nonato es un emprendedor que se  le ha brindado financiamiento para invertir en su negocio para la compra de productos para la pulpería y ofrecerles así a sus clientes variedad de productos. Este emprendedor ya ha  tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, durante el crédito ha mostrado ser una persona responsable y con deseos de superación su mayor sueño es tener su negocio bien surtido su negocio y llegar a ser una distribuidora. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento par a comprar productos como  granos básicos, detergente, aceite, jabón, pan, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Ramón Nonato is an enterprising man who been provided a loan to invest in stock for his business, thereby offering a better variety of products to his customers. 

This hard worker has taken out a loan before with Fundación León 2000. Through the loan he has shown that he is a responsible person with goals to succeed. His biggest dreams are to have his business well stocked and for his business to become a distributor. Currently he is requesting a loan to purchase products such as basic grains, detergents, oil, soap, bread, among other products.

loans.use: purchase basic grains, detergent, oil, soap, bread, among other products

loans.name: Vaigafa

texts.en:
Vaigafa is an 18-year-old woman who is married. She works in her family's business, selling baked goods in the local community. She has one year of experience in this business. Vaigafa needs a loan of WST 1,000 to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She plans to use the profit from her sales (estimated to be WST 250 per week) to improve and expand the business.

In 2012, Vaigafa joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Vaigafa's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make baked goods for sale

loans.name: Jonbi

texts.ru: Чонби жительница города Куляб. Ей 43 года. Она разведена. У нее четверо детей. Ее дочь студентка. Сама она портниха. Чонби более семи лет занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Она берет кредит для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Jonbi lives in the city of Kulob. She is 43 years old, divorced, and has four children. One of her daughters is a college student. Jonbi is a seamstress and has been making traditional dresses for over seven years. She is taking this loan to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Safarkhon

texts.ru: Сафархон житель района Муминобод. Ему 32 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Сафархон занимается изготовлением деревянных окон и дверей. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения набора необходимых инструментов своему помощнику.
texts.en: Safarkhon lives in the Muminobod region. He is 32 years old, married, and has three children. Safarkhon manufactures wooden doors and window frames. He has been engaged in this activity for 7 years. He is taking this loan to purchase a set of necessary tools for his assistant.

loans.use: to purchase necessary tools

loans.name: Vaiono

texts.en:
Vaiono is 43 years old and married with four children. She owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting ta'amu for sale. She has two years of experience in this business. Vaiono needs a loan of WST 1,000 to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome. She plans to use the profit from her sales (estimated to be WST 300 per week) to continue improving her land.

In 2012, Vaiono joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Vaiono's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers to grow ta'amu

loans.name: Pene

texts.en:
Pene is 54 years old and married with six children. She owns and operates a business venture, selling fried foods in the local community. She has two years of experience in this business. Pene needs a loan to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be WST 550 per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2010, Pene joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Pene's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make fried foods for sale

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнаре 43 года, замужем. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Гульнара занимается животноводством.  Начатое 17 лет  назад со стартовой суммы в 3,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Доходы от бизнес- деятельности позволили Гульнаре расширить деятельность за счет засева картофелем и пшеницей. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульнара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков на откорм и перепродажу. Доходы Гульнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulnara is 43 years old and married. As a source of income for her family, Gulnara raises cattle. Her business, launched 17 years ago with a starting sum of 3,000 som (KGS), currently earns around 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products. Her business profits have allowed Gulnara to expand the range of her activities and to start planting potatoes and wheat. In order to continue developing her business, Gulnara has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves for fattening and subsequent resale. She plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Valeria

texts.en:
Valeria is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 
Valeria has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 11,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.
Valeria has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Valeria hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, cereals, soap, shampoo, and beverages

loans.name: Erdenebat

texts.en:
Mr. Erdenebat, 36, is a transportation driver and lives with his two children and wife in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, in the Kherlen town of Dornod, a province of Mongolia. He has been running a transportation business since 2001 and has gained a lot of experience. With the initial business earnings, he bought a small-sized piece of land and a small, old house. But in the past few years, his income has been declining due to fewer job orders.

Last summer, he started to rebuild his old house. His previous house was very old and absolutely in unlivable condition. Erdenebat was trying to finish rebuilding his house before winter started. This time, he is planning to build an entrance hall for his house. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchase the building materials to build it.

loans.use: To purchase the building materials to build an entrance hall for his house.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 18 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children. 

Analyn has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Analyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap, and beverages.

loans.name: Rahib

texts.ru: Rahib molodoy chelovek kotoromu 25 let. On ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Rahib uje 4 qoda kak zanimayetsya skotovodostvom i razvodit korov. On nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit 2 korovi dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa i uvelicheniya mesachnix doxodov. Rahib yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda seychas projivayet vmeste so svoimi roditelyami v Fuzuli regione. On pomogayet soderjat svoyu semyu.
texts.en: Rahib is a young man 25 years of age. He is single and has no children. For the past four years, Rahib has been raising cattle. Presently, he needs 2000 AZN to buy two cows in order to expand his business and increase his monthly income. Rahib is an internally displaced person from the city of Fuzuli, currently living with his parents in the Fuzuli region. He is helping to support his family.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows

loans.name: Boturkhon

texts.ru: Ботурхон житель района Фархор. Он женат. Ему 43 года. У него четверо детей. Ботурхон разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности он 12 лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Boturkhon lives in the Farkhor region. He is 43 years old, married, and has four children. Boturkhon has been raising cattle for sale for the past 12 years. He is taking this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Valijon

texts.ru: Валичон проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Валичон занимается торговлей. Он в основном продает женскую одежду и обувь. Этим видом деятельности занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Valijon lives in the city of Kulob. He is 33 years old, married, and has three children. Valijon is engaged in retail, selling mainly women's clothing and footwear. He has been doing this for the past eight years. He is taking this loan to increase the volume of his sales.

loans.use: to purchase spring clothing and footwear

loans.name: Nancy Maria

texts.es: Nancy vive con sus 2 hijos en las edades de 6 y 11 años, en el municipio de Soledad.  Allí se dedica a la comercialización de productos de belleza, como cremas reductoras, de baño para cuerpo, etc. los cuales le envían desde un país vecino y también vende ropa en diversas líneas, que elabora su hermana, dedicada a la confección y distribución de vestidos. Algunos productos que les piden sus clientes los compra en el centro de la ciudad y también accede a artículos que vienen promocionados con descuentos especiales en guías especializadas. Su meta mas adelante es tener un almacén y un depósito para distribuir entre clientes vendedores. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa y una gran variedad de productos cosméticos y multiusos, con los que piensa impactar a su clientela el día de las madres y hacer su mejor venta. Mientras esto ocurre su sueño es adquirir un vehículo y lograr que sus hijos tengan un futuro exitoso.
texts.en:
Nancy lives with her two children, ages 6 and 11, in the municipality of Soledad.  There she works selling beauty products like slimming creams, bath products, etc. that she imports from a neighboring country.  She also sells clothing of many types, which her sister makes, as her sister is a seamstress who makes and sells dresses.

Some of the products her customers ask for, she buys downtown and she also has access to promotional items with particular discounts in her specialized directories.  Her goal for the future is to have a wholesale outlet and a warehouse to distribute to other vendors.  Right now, she is applying for a micro-loan, the first financial loan she's made with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy clothing and a great variety of cosmetics and multipurpose products.  She intends to use these products to widen her clientele for Mother's Day and make greater sales.  As this happens, her dream is to acquire a vehicle and guarantee a successful future for her children.

loans.use: to buy clothing and a wide variety of cosmetics and multipurpose products.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children. 

Aida has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, biscuits, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Aida has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, biscuits, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Elshan

texts.ru:
Elshan jenatiy chelovek. On imeyet 2 detey. Elshan jivet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda. Elshan 45 let.
Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit letnuyu odejdu dlya prodaji. On uje 7 let kak zanimayetsya prodajey detskoy i vzrosloy odejdi. On xochet razvit i uvelichit svoy bizness.
texts.en: Elshan is married and has 2 children. He lives in the Fuzuli region with his wife and children, having been displaced from the city of Fuzuli. Elshan is 45 years old. Currently, he is in need of 2000 AZN to purchase summer clothing for sale. Elshan has been selling adult and children's clothing for the past 7 years. He would like to develop and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for sale

loans.name: Kleyner Damian

texts.es:
Kleyner Damián tiene 19 años de edad es soltero, vive con sus padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.  
Kleyner Damián es guardia de seguridad.
Solicita el crédito para pagar medicamentos para su hermano que se encuentra entre la vida y la muerte.
Con la ayuda del crédito ayudara para pagar los medicamentos requeridos.
Las compras de medicamentos los realizan en Ventanas y Guayaquil.	
El  sueño es poder tener su propio negocio.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son los problemas de la salud.
En el tiempo libre le gusta estar tranquilo, descansando junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Kleyner Damián is 19 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in the canton Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.  

Kleyner Damián is a security guard.  He is asking for this loan to buy medications for his brother, who is at death's door.  With the help of a loan, he will be able to help buy the medications required to help.  He will buy the medicines in Ventanas and Guayaquil.	

His dream is to own his own business.  The hardship he currently faces are these health problems.  In his free time he likes to be quiet and relax with his family.

loans.use: to pay for medications for his brother, who is at death's door.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. María, tiene 46 años, está casada con el Sr. Adolfo hace 18 años, del matrimonio nacieron tres  hijos, de los cuales uno falleció. 
La Sra. María Teresa  es comerciante hace más de 14 años, tiene dos salones comerciales en el Mercado Municipal  donde vende especies al por mayor y menor como: manzanillas, boldo, anís, eneldo, azafrán, semilla de lino, hierbas medicinales, pomadas, jarabes, entre otros productos naturales. Comenzó con un pequeño local con ventas al menudeo,  poco a poco fue creciendo con la clientela que formaba con mucho sacrificio,  empeño y la ayuda de su familia. Comenta que en esta época tiene mucha competencia por lo que hay que mejorar los precios y el servicio para mantener a la clientela. Ella con su carisma y amabilidad atiende personalmente junto con marido y también ayudan los hijos. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de manzanilla, boldo, anís, eneldo, azafrán, semilla de lino, hierbas medicinales, etc., con lo que podrá abastecerse y de esa forma tener buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: María is 46 years old. She is married to Adolfo; they have been married for 18 years and had 3 children, one of which passed away. She has been a businesswoman for the past 14 years. She has two commercial spaces that are located in the municipal market, where she sells medicinal herbs for wholesale and retail purchases. She sells chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed, herbs, ointments, syrups, and other natural products. She started with a small store. doing retail sales. Little by little she has grown her customer base, with much sacrifice, dedication and help from her family. She said that right now she has a lot of competition, and knows that she will need to improve her prices and provide great service in order to retain her customers. With her charisma and friendly nature, she helps customers along side her husband and her children who also help. She requested a loan to buy chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed and other medicinal herbs. This will allow her to stock her stores, which will help her to have a good variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed, and other medicinal herbs.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura  es una mujer de 70 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos, ninguno a su cargo. Vive en casa propia junto a su esposo en el pueblo joven Santa Rosa, en el distrito de Morropón. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. Su comunidad es grande, sin embargo, su vivienda es precaria.
Laura se dedica a la comercialización de animales menores, tales como  porcinos, caprinos, gallinas, entre otros desde hace 4 años en el distrito de Morropón. Engorda a los animales hasta que alcancen su talla y peso ideal para comercializarlos en el mercado local.
El monto del préstamo es de 2000 nuevos soles, el cual solicita para invertirlo en su negocio, específicamente para la compra  ovejas, chivos, chanchos, ya que están a un buen precio, para que de esa manera tenga mejores ingresos y en consecuencia una mejor condición de vida en la zona.
La inversión en el negocio, la ayudará a tener mejores utilidades, ya que el mercado  es bueno para este tipo de negocio, pues en su mayoría los habitantes se dedican  a la crianza y por ende a la comercialización de animales menores.
texts.en:
Laura is a 70 year old woman; she's married and has two children, neither of whom are still in her care.  She lives in her own home with her husband in the new town of Santa Rosa, in the district of Morropón.  She has good work and personal references.  Her community is large, yet her place in it is precarious.

Laura is engaged in the sale of young animals, some of which are pigs, goats, hens, and others for the past four years in the Morropón district.  She fattens the animals until they reach their full size and ideal weight to be sold in the local market.

The total sum of her loan is 2000 Soles, which she is asking for to invest in her business, specifically to buy sheep, goats, and pigs since they are at a good price so that she can have a greater profit margin and, as a result, a better life in her hometown.  Her investment in the business will help her to have better profits, since the market is good for this type of business venture, since mostly the people of her village are involved in raising animals and therefore sell smaller animals.

loans.use: to invest in new animals like sheep, goats, and pigs to sell in the local market.

loans.name: Jipargul

texts.ru: Жыпаргул 53 года, замужем, воспитала 3 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Жыпаргул занимается животноводством.  Начатое 30 лет  назад со стартовой суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На сегодня в хозяйстве Жыпаргул имеется 2 коровы, 2 лошади и 15 овец.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жыпаргул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телки и бычков на откорм и перепродажу. Доходы Жыпаргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Jipargul is 53 years old, married and has raised three children. To provide income for her family, Jipargul works in animal husbandry. Starting 30 years ago with an initial sum of 1,000 som (KGS), today the farm brings in around 6,000 som (KGS) a month from selling milk and dairy products. Today on her farm, Jipargul has 2 cows, 2 horses and 15 sheep. In order to grow her business, Jipargul has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 130,000 som to purchase heifers and bulls for fattening and resale. With the income, Jipargul plans to invest in the farm's future growth.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Boturkhon

texts.ru: Бохтурхон житель района Хамадони. Он женат. Ему 41 год. У него четверо детей. Он предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для ремонта автомашины.
texts.en: Boturkhon lives in the Hamadoni region. He is 41 years old and married with four children. He offers taxi services and has a lot of experience in this field. He is requesting a loan for car repairs.

loans.use: pay for car repairs

loans.name: Rahmatullo

texts.ru: Рахматулло житель Яванского района. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Он предоставляет услугу, он сварщик. Кроме того у него имеется мельница, где он изготавливает муку. Этим видом деятельности занимается год. Кредит берет для закупа пшеницы.
texts.en: Rahmatullo lives in the Yavan region. He is 46 years old, married with seven children. He is a welder. Besides this, he has a mill where he produces flour. He has been in this line of work for a year. He is requesting a loan to purchase wheat.

loans.use: purchase wheat

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.ru: Ибодат жительница города Худжанд. Ей 55 лет. Она вдова. У нее четверо детей. Она занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном она продает носки и женскую обувь. Этим видом деятельности занимается более 30 лет. Кредит берет для покупки сезонного товара.
texts.en: Ibodat lives in the city of Khujand. She is 55 years old. She is a widow with four children. She is a merchant in the market. In general, she sells socks and women's shoes. She has been in this line of work for more than 30 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase seasonal goods.

loans.use: purchase men's and women's t-shirts,  shirts, socks and stockings

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
José Miguel tiene 22 años de edad tiene un hijo es soltero, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de  Guaranda Provincia de BOLÌVAR.
José Miguel trabaja como albañil mediante contratos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar una moto y herramientas como martillo, serruchos, desarmador, llave inglesa,  de trabajo para facilitar su medio de transporte y para el bienestar de su familia.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá tener mayores ingresos y beneficio para si mismo, para dar la educación a su hijo y ayudar a su familia.
Las compras de las herramientas lo realizan frecuentemente en la ciudad de Ventanas.
El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo para uso exclusivo y comodidad para el y su familia.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las malas condiciones climáticas.
En el tiempo libre le gusta estar tranquilo, descansando, y mirando televisión.
texts.en:
José Miguel is 22 years old and is single with one son.  He lives with his parents in the city of Guaranda, in the Bolívar province.

José Miguel works as a contracted construction worker.  He is asking for a loan to buy himself a motorcycle and tools like a hammer, saws, a screwdriver, and a monkey wrench for his work to make it easier for him to travel and for the well-being of his family.

With the help of this loan, he will be able to make more profits for himself to give an education to his son and help out his family.  He is usually able to buy his tools in Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a personal vehicle for his sole use and for his family's convenience.  His greatest struggles currently are with the bad weather.  In his free time he likes to sit quietly, relaxing and watching television.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle and tools like a hammer, hand saws, a screwdriver, and monkey wrench.

loans.name: Rosa Magali

texts.es:
Rosa M. es una mujer en estado civil de separación, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo, de 12 y 9 años de edad respectivamente. Es conocida en su comunidad urbana y tiene buenas relaciones vecinales, así como también buenas referencias personales y laborales.
Rosa M.  dedicada a la fabricación de productos de cerámica para bautizos, matrimonios. Tiene una experiencia de 4 años en el negocio. Su actividad la realiza en su domicilio ubicado en el distrito de Picsi - Chiclayo.
El monto del crédito desembolsado sería de 2000 nuevos soles, los cuales serían invertidos para la compra de insumos para una mejor producción de objetos cerámicos y así mejorar su calidad de vida y aumentar la satisfacción de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa M. is a woman who is legally separated. She has two children in her care, ages 12 and 9. She is known in her urban community and has good relationships with her neighbors as well as good personal and work references.

Rosa M. makes ceramic products for baptisms and weddings. She has four years of experience in this business. She does her work in her home, which is located in the district of Picsi, Chiclayo.

The amount of the loan disbursed will be 2000 PEN, which will be invested in the purchase of supplies for a better production of ceramic objects, thus improving her quality of life and the satisfaction of her customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the fabrication of ceramic products and thus improve her quality of life and the satisfaction of her customers.

loans.name: Monica Natali

texts.es:
Mónica es una persona alegre, responsable, felíz y trabajadora. Mónica tiene 20 años vive con sus padres en Latacunga provincia de Cotopaxi.

Mónica trabaja con sus padres en la crianza y venta de ganado, este negocio ayuda a solventar los gastos de sus estudios y necesidades de su hogar, en vista que necesita dinero para seguir con sus estudios Mónica decide realizar un crédito a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de vaca lechera, para producción y venta de leche, lo que generará mayores ingresos y permitirán mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de sus padres.

Mónica sueña con ser una buena profesional y poder formar un hogar.
texts.en:
Mónica is a cheerful, responsible, happy, and hardworking person.  Mónica is 20 years old and lives with her parents in Latacunga in the province of Cotopaxi.

Mónica works with her parents raising and selling cattle, this work helps to pay for her studies and the household expenses.  Realizing that she will need money to continue her studies, Mónica has decided to ask for a loan from Fodemi which she will invest to buy a milch cow to produce milk for sale.  This will generate more income and allow her and her family to have a better quality of life.

Mónica dreams of becoming a businesswoman and being able to have her own home.

loans.use: to grow her business by buying a milch cow for the production and sale of milk.

loans.name: Lasso El Vergel Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Solidario Lasso El Vergel está conformado por cuatro personas que tienen un mismo fin que es el de triunfar en la vida y sacar adelante a sus familias. En este grupo la presidenta es Gladys debido a que es una persona responsable, trabajadora y con grandes aspiraciones en la vida, Gladys es viuda, vive solo con sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Latacunga en la Provincia de Latacunga.
